Articles.Content:
Maybe its a Mission of a Mod...

In this mission I have to make that Tourists have a "passing out" by G- Force...

One time before I had made this successfull, so I accepted it again for other Tourists.

But they have to be in Orbit now. I thought the must complete an orbit around Kerbin and then "passing out" f.e. in reentry would be easy...

 

I have to make the "passing out" while they are in Orbit arount Kerbin :-/ I tryed with a Rotor, but this dint work.

I tryed with strong Engines, but this is to difficoult to not get out of the orbit inwards or outwards...

 

Can someone help me find a way to make Kerbals having "passing out" while in Kerbin Orbit?

thx RaphX
